title: I got away with trolling. GG EZ. here the secret.
body:
dont type anything in the chat. you can int feed, afk as long as u dodge leaverbuster, steal ur own jungler's camp, anything.

i trolled, afk'd, int fed in at least 10 out of my most 20 recent games. people kept saying "omg ur reported enjoy ur ban" and guess what. i never got a ban. What i noticed, is that i had a 25 game chat restriction. the last indicator that this works is that i have never, ever been punished for other reasons than chat. Also when u check out the forums, the only reason people are getting suspended is related to chat.

so thats it. dont chat and u can troll as much as you want.

replies.body: Bro you got it slightly wrong. If you really want to troll, you need to type gj team and wp guys. Be super positive while running into enemy towers. People do that to me all the time.
Good idea to signal the rioters of your actions

they will actually haha

your post is accurate but  bragging about your trolling on the forums is one of the fastest ways to get banned.  the only way to do it faster is to spam hatespeech.  :)

Its silly how the usual Riot worshipping fanatics of this board try to censor this 100% valid information with downvotes. Its a legitimate issue that should not be ignored. Riots automated system is ineffective when it comes to anything other than chat.

i am pretty sure riot knows this.  i believe they cant find the real trolls because the vast majority of their reports are from abusive chat or the like.  

so maybe their plan was to eventually eliminate toxic chat by creating this program to detect and punish it.  then having eliminated 95% of their reports, they can manually review a higher % of the reports to catch real trolls.

the plan does not appear to be working.
This is why we need a way to report someone outside of game...

People generally don't complain on the boards when they get banned for intentionally feeding because they know what they did was wrong. The people who come to the boards because of a chat ban think that what they did is (or should be) acceptable and thus complain.

chat bans are instant. when have u reported some1 who trolled, int fed and afk and saw the message that they were punished? it nevers happens. however, the message pops up maybe 10 minutes when its chat related.

It takes longer to get banned for what you are doing because the systems currently have issues detecting it, but you will be punished for it eventually. There are posts here about them occasionally, but usually people who did things like that know why they were punished so they don't come here to ask about it.

HOW TO TROLL AND GET AWAY WITH IT!
If you want to troll and get away with it think to yourself "what would a bronze 5 do?" Then do that all the time! Riot explicitly says they do not ban people for being unskilled so if you want to circumvent the system all you have to do is play poorly on purpose! 
1. TILT YOUR TEAM- in pregame lobby tell your team that they will lose and you will troll and their report means nothing, tell them they don't deserve a win
2. Always facecheck bushes 
3. Start fights outnumbered
4. Steal kills
5. Miss all skillshots
6. Focus the support 
7. DONT Ward
8. Go into other lanes pretend to go in then do nothing and let your teammate waste abilities/die
9. Go into other lanes and steal farm/ exp
10. Use a nonsense build and runes
11. Abandon carries in team fights
12. Do not listen to pings 
13. Snowball enemy carries, give their carries around 2 or 3 kills to start to put your own carries at a disadvantage
14. No surrender, you only have a limited time with your teammates make sure you prolong the game as long as possible especially if your team is feeding, this will help tilt them for the next game
TIPS TO NOT GET BANNED 
1. Do not talk- most bans are chat related, focus on making the teammate mad in ways that don't require talking
2. Do not feed to excess, your goal is to have your teammates have worse scores and more deaths than you so that if your game is reviewed by a riot employee you don't look like you inted
3. Once you succeed in making your teammates mad make sure to report them if they were toxic as a result remember the golden rule- riot cannot ban you for unskilled play (they won't know if you do it on purpose;) ) but if your team reacts negatively to your actions, it behooves you to report so that they can be punished instead!

That really shows how messed up this automated system is. Mess with your friends or say something dumb in chat but carry your team going like 24/11/12 support gragas but get banned with no one reporting you. Really makes me question things.
